sn40.6:1.4: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
sn40.6:1.6: So khvaham, avuso, sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharami.
sn40.6:1.7: Tassa mayham, avuso, imina viharena viharato akasanancayatanasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti.
sn40.6:2.1: Atha kho mam, avuso, bhagava iddhiya upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn40.6:2.3: Ma, brahmana, vinnanancayatanam pamado, vinnanancayatane cittam santhapehi, vinnanancayatane cittam ekodim karohi, vinnanancayatane cittam samadaha’ti.
sn40.6:2.4: So khvaham, avuso, aparena samayena sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja vihasim.
sn40.6:2.5: Yanhi tam, avuso, samma vadamano vadeyya …pe… mahabhinnatam patto”ti.
